lists.description: Lauren Bacall said "I am not a has-been, I am a will-be".   In addition to a long career as an award-winning actress, she won the National Book Award for her autobiography By Myself in 1980.   Here is a selection of her work from our collections.
lists.name: Lauren Bacall

lists.description: Biographies and fictional works about imposters.
lists.name: Imposters: Real and Imagined

lists.description: From captains of industry to investment bankers these are the stories of tycoons, biographies and fiction.
lists.name: Tycoons: Real and Imagined

lists.description: Richard Linklater's new film Boyhood was 12 years in the making. The film tells the story of the life of a young man, Mason, from age 5 to age 18. Here are some novels that also concern themselves with the passing of time.
lists.name: The Passing of Time

lists.description: HBO's latest addictive hit show The Leftovers was a book by Tom Perrotta before hitting the small screen. Here are some books, like The Leftovers, where interconnected stories make up the novel.
lists.name: The Leftovers

lists.description: Chilling mysteries set in freezing climates to read in the August heat.
lists.name: Chilling Mysteries for August in NYC

lists.description: 10 books set in the hottest places on earth.
lists.name: Hotter than NYC in August

lists.description: South African author Nadine Gordimer, honored many times for her work including receiving a Booker Prize and the Nobel Prize for Literature, has passed away.  Here are a selection of her titles from our circulating collections.
lists.name: Remembering Nadine Gordimer

lists.description: Some of the most memorable life stories that make it into print do not involve the powerful or famous, rather they uncover the lives of regular people in extraordinary circumstances.  They can inspire us, humble us, make us laugh or make us cry.   Here are a selection of memoirs that will stay with you long after you finish them.
lists.name: Memoirs & Bios that tug at the heart

lists.description: The most anticipated titles coming in July.
lists.name: July Books
